source: TEXT_JOBMCH580_01710_SEQ_00<tab>Stephanivien is frustrated by the lack of movement evinced by the wheels of justice.
target: TEXT_JOBMCH580_01710_SEQ_00<tab>スカイスチール機工房のステファニヴィアンは、冒険者に伝えたいことがあるようだ。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH580_01710_SEQ_01<tab>Stephanivien seems confused by the Temple Knights' seeming inertia─a confusion that is compounded by the sudden arrival of a smirking Tedalgrinche. The nobleman casually explains how the manufactory's evidence against him was overturned, and goes on to deliver an ultimatum to the chief machinist: slay the dragon Veri Selen, or be judged guilty by the Holy See. Realizing that to face the immense beast is akin to suicide, Rostnsthal offers to spare the machinists by turning himself in for the crime of insurrection. Speak with Stephanivien and discuss what can be done.
target: TEXT_JOBMCH580_01710_SEQ_01<tab>スカイスチール機工房の嫌疑を晴らすため、ロスティンスタルが罪をかぶると言って、姿を消した。スカイスチール機工房の「ステファニヴィアン」と話そう。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH580_01710_SEQ_02<tab>Unwilling to allow Rostnsthal to suffer for crimes he did not commit, Stephanivien vows to convince the instructor that they have a chance to win against Veri Selen. Head to Ok' Vundu Vana in the Sea of Clouds, and acquire clear lightning crystals for the chief machinist's latest marvel.
target: TEXT_JOBMCH580_01710_SEQ_02<tab>ステファニヴィアンと話した。アバラシア雲海のオク・ブンド・ヴァナにある「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E9D0201 /var>」を調べて、「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B9A01 /var>」を入手しよう。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH580_01710_SEQ_03<tab>You steal into Ok' Vundu Vana, and lighten the Vanu Vanu's baskets. Return to the Skysteel Manufactory and deliver the crystals to Stephanivien.
target: TEXT_JOBMCH580_01710_SEQ_03<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B9A01 /var>を手に入れた。スカイスチール機工房の「ステファニヴィアン」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B9A01 /var>」を渡そう。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH580_01710_SEQ_04<tab>Stephanivien gratefully accepts the Vanu Vanu's unwitting contribution to machinistry, and uses the crystals to enhance the performance of your autoturrets. With luck, this latest advancement will be sufficiently impressive to change Rostnsthal's stubborn course...
target: TEXT_JOBMCH580_01710_SEQ_04<tab>ステファニヴィアンに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B9A01 /var>を渡して、新たな機能を追加してもらった。これで、ロスティンスタルの自首を止めることができるだろうか……。
TEXT_JOBMCH580_01710_TODO_00<tab>ステファニヴィアンと話す

source: TEXT_JOBMCH580_01710_TODO_01<tab>Investigate locked baskets and obtain clear lightning crystals.
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH580_01710_TODO_01オク・ブンド・ヴァナのを調べて
を入手

source: TEXT_JOBMCH580_01710_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the clear lightning crystals to Stephanivien at the Skysteel Manufactory.
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH580_01710_TODO_02スカイスチール機工房のステファニヴィアンに
を渡す

source: TEXT_JOBMCH580_01710_STEPHANIVIEN_000_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I trust your training fares well? I have heard naught on the fate of the manufactory, and would welcome fair news from any quarter...
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH580_01710_STEPHANIVIEN_000_000やあ、)) (( )) 02 /var>。
銃の鍛練は順調のようだね。
それにひきかえ、工房は先行き不透明だ……。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH580_01710_JOYE_000_001<tab>Bad news, me lordship: we talked to a clerk who works at the Congregation, and he says the accusation against the workshop ain't been lifted yet.
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH580_01710_JOYE_000_001ぼっちゃま、神殿騎士団本部に確認したところ、
工房への監視処分は、まだ取り下げられていませんでした。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH580_01710_ROSTNSTHAL_000_002<tab>What's worse, it seems they ain't inclined to pursue yer case against Tedalgrinche, neither.
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH580_01710_ROSTNSTHAL_000_002話を聞いた神殿騎士の様子だと、
テダルグランシュの捜査も、進んでいない様子だったな。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH580_01710_STEPHANIVIEN_000_003<tab>I do not understand. When I presented my evidence to the Temple Knights, the officer in charge seemed convinced of our innocence...
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH580_01710_STEPHANIVIEN_000_003やはりか……集めた証拠を神殿騎士団に提出した時は、
担当官も、俺たちの無実に納得してくれていたのに……。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH580_01710_TEDALGRINCHE_000_004<tab>Ahahaha, my dear, naive Stephanivien. Truth is dictated by the victor─the one most skilled in strategy; the one most adept at maneuvering. One such as <var 1A 02 /var>me<var 1A 01 /var>.
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH580_01710_TEDALGRINCHE_000_004「真実とは、勝者が創り上げるもの」ですよ。
そして勝者とは、戦略と戦術に長ける者のこと……。
この私のように、ね……オホホホホ。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH580_01710_STEPHANIVIEN_000_005<tab>How dare you show your face in my manufactory! Have you no shame at all!?
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH580_01710_STEPHANIVIEN_000_005お、おまっ、よくもこの工房に顔を出せるな。
まったく、どういう計測器をもちあわせてるんだ！？

source: TEXT_JOBMCH580_01710_TEDALGRINCHE_000_006<tab>Shame? Why, you were the one who submitted a <var 1A 02 /var>forgery<var 1A 01 /var> of my house's seal in an attempt to deflect your obvious guilt. Upon review of the evidence, however, the Temple Knights shall soon rule in my favor.
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH580_01710_TEDALGRINCHE_000_006「」を「偽造」され、
あらぬ罪を着せられかけましたが、やはり真実は私の味方……。
内乱予備罪に関わる真実も、間もなく確定するでしょう。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH580_01710_STEPHANIVIEN_000_007<tab>But our sources were unimpeachable! Our innocence was all but proven!
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH580_01710_STEPHANIVIEN_000_007なんだと！？
俺たちの無実は証明されたはずだ！

source: TEXT_JOBMCH580_01710_TEDALGRINCHE_000_008<tab>The twice-altered testimony of a commoner is hardly unimpeachable... And you cannot deny claims that the ailing House Haillenarte has been arming the lowborn and inciting them to seize their “independence.” We have all heard the shots fired within the city walls...
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH580_01710_TEDALGRINCHE_000_008証言を二転三転させる「平民」の声に、価値などありません。
落ち目のアインハルト家が、平民に武器を配り、
都市内で騒ぎを扇動している……これこそが真実です。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH580_01710_STEPHANIVIEN_000_009<tab>You would twist and corrupt everything we have worked for...
target: TEXT_JOBMCH580_01710_STEPHANIVIEN_000_009<tab>くっ、俺たちの証言も証拠も、全部もみけされたのか……。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH580_01710_TEDALGRINCHE_000_010<tab>Ahahaha! As I said, such is the privilege of the victor. If you wish, I might even be willing to teach you how to bend this situation to your advantage.
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH580_01710_TEDALGRINCHE_000_010「真実とは、勝者が創り上げるもの」なのです。
貴方が望む真実の作り方を、
教えて差し上げてもよろしいんですよ、オホホホホ……。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH580_01710_STEPHANIVIEN_000_011<tab>Hmph, we shall do well enough on our own. Now, exit my manufactory ere you find your shiny armor doused with machine oil!
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH580_01710_STEPHANIVIEN_000_011フン、そんなもの自分で探すさ。
その小ぎれいなおべべが機械油にまみれる前に、
さっさと出ていくんだな！？

source: TEXT_JOBMCH580_01710_TEDALGRINCHE_000_012<tab>You would spurn my generous advice? Will you truly surrender your last chance to demonstrate House Haillenarte's unswerving devotion to Ishgard's prosperity?
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH580_01710_TEDALGRINCHE_000_012おやおや、せっかく良い話を持ってきたのに……。
アインハルト家が、皇都「イシュガルド」の繁栄を願う、
愛国の徒であることを示す、絶好の好機があるのです。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH580_01710_TEDALGRINCHE_000_013<tab>There is a beast that has been harassing our supply trains of late─a menace that the Holy See greatly desires to see put down. Even cloistered here amongst your scrap-covered benches, you must have heard tales of the fearsome Veri Selen...
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH580_01710_TEDALGRINCHE_000_013最近、輸送部隊への襲撃を繰り返している大物のドラゴン族……
「」と言いましたかね。
アレを、教皇庁の司祭の前で討伐すればいいのですよ。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH580_01710_STEPHANIVIEN_000_0014<tab>Veri Selen!? The same dragon that the Order of the Knights Dragoon has failed time and again to slay!?
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH580_01710_STEPHANIVIEN_000_0014「」だと！？
竜騎士団も手を焼いている大物だぞ！？

source: TEXT_JOBMCH580_01710_ROSTNSTHAL_000_0015<tab>'E means to make a bloody show of ye, boss...
target: TEXT_JOBMCH580_01710_ROSTNSTHAL_000_0015<tab>悪趣味な貴族の見世物にするつもりか……。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH580_01710_TEDALGRINCHE_000_016<tab>The Holy See has agreed to abolish your trial in exchange for the dragon's death. Pray send word when you are prepared to face Veri Selen─I shall organize for a priest to be present, and provide you with suitable...“bait.”
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH580_01710_TEDALGRINCHE_000_016教皇庁のお歴々も、この任を審査に代えてくださるそうです。
覚悟ができたら、私へご連絡ください。
立会人の司祭様や、囮の輸送部隊の手配をいたしましょう。

TEXT_JOBMCH580_01710_JOYE_000_017ぼ、ぼっちゃま……
工房は、どうなってしまうのでしょう……。
今度こそ、もう……。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH580_01710_ROSTNSTHAL_000_018<tab>Bah, I'll just confess it was me what was firin' me weapon. Ye shouldn't 'ave any trouble layin' the blame on a drunken outsider─'specially one what's known for 'is vicious crimes. That oughta get ye off the insurrection charges at least.
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH580_01710_ROSTNSTHAL_000_018先の発砲騒ぎは、俺の仕業だと名乗りでてやる。
異邦人である俺の酔った末の不始末ということにしておけば、
少なくとも、反乱予備罪の嫌疑は晴れるはずだ。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH580_01710_STEPHANIVIEN_000_019<tab>No! You cannot do such a thing!
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH580_01710_STEPHANIVIEN_000_019はっ！？
何を言うんだ、そんなことできるわけないだろ！？

source: TEXT_JOBMCH580_01710_ROSTNSTHAL_000_020<tab>I lived 'alf me life in a ship's cabin, an' a prison cell ain't much smaller. Ye can pay me for the time in the brig after they let me out.
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH580_01710_ROSTNSTHAL_000_020こちとら、船倉暮らしが長かったもんでね。
監獄暮らしも苦じゃないさ。
刑期分の給金を、シャバに出てからくれりゃあいい。
TEXT_JOBMCH580_01710_JOYE_000_021<tab>わ、私が追いかけて、指南役を引き留めます！

source: TEXT_JOBMCH580_01710_STEPHANIVIEN_000_022<tab>By the Fury, that man's full of surprises... My prospectometer had naught to say of this eventuality.
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH580_01710_STEPHANIVIEN_000_022くそっ、こんなことになるなんて……。
なんとかしないと……。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH580_01710_STEPHANIVIEN_000_030<tab>I cannot allow our instructor to sacrifice himself for the manufactory. We have no choice but to accept Tedalgrinche's impossible challenge.
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH580_01710_STEPHANIVIEN_000_030指南役を工房の犠牲にするわけにはいかない。
……やはり、テダルグランシュの審査を受けるしかないか。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH580_01710_STEPHANIVIEN_000_031<tab>But I fear Rostnsthal will not be convinced unless we prove we have a chance of defeating Veri Selen.
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH580_01710_STEPHANIVIEN_000_031だが、指南役を納得させるには、
俺たちが「」を倒せるという確証が必要だろう。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH580_01710_STEPHANIVIEN_000_032<tab>...I do have a machinistry marvel in mind that might just do the trick. Its implementation, however, will require a number of clear lightning crystals, of the like found in the Sea of Clouds.
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH580_01710_STEPHANIVIEN_000_032……構想中の新しい機能を実現してみよう。
そのためには、アバラシア雲海にあるという、
「」が必要だ。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH580_01710_STEPHANIVIEN_000_033<tab>'Tis said that the Vanu Vanu store such crystals for use in their tribal ceremonies. Pray steal into Ok' Vundu Vana, and lighten their baskets a touch. Surely they won't miss a handful or two...
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH580_01710_STEPHANIVIEN_000_033バヌバヌ族が、儀式に用いると聞いたことがある……。
オク・ブンド・ヴァナに赴き、「」から、
とってきてくれないか？

source: TEXT_JOBMCH580_01710_STEPHANIVIEN_000_039<tab>For the machinistry marvel I have in mind, I shall have need of the clear lightning crystals found in the Sea of Clouds...
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH580_01710_STEPHANIVIEN_000_039構想中の新しい機能を実現してみよう。
そのためには、アバラシア雲海にあるという、
「」が必要だ。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH580_01710_STEPHANIVIENE_000_040<tab>For the machinistry marvel I have in mind, I shall have need of the clear lightning crystals found in the Sea of Clouds...
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH580_01710_STEPHANIVIENE_000_040構想中の新しい機能を実現してみよう。
そのためには、アバラシア雲海にあるという、
「」が必要だ。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH580_01710_STEPHANIVIEN_000_041<tab>Ah, yes, these are wonderful specimens. These crystals shall allow me to broaden the capabilities of your aetherotransformer via a more efficient process of energy conversion. I only hope it will be impressive enough to convince our instructor to abandon his foolish course!
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH580_01710_STEPHANIVIEN_000_041……よし、これでキミの機工兵装を改造するよ。
魔力の吸収効率を高めて、新しい機能を追加するのさ。
これで、指南役を納得させられるといいんだが……。
